text: The best things in life are the people we love, the places we've been, and the memories we've made along the way.
author: null

text: Sometimes, the smallest moments take up the most space in your heart.
author: null

text: We didn't realize we were making memories, we just knew we were having fun.
author: null

text: Memories are timeless treasures of the heart.
author: null

text: The best memories come from bad ideas done with best friends.
author: null

text: I've never tried to block out the memories of the past, even though some are painful. I don't understand people who hide from their past. Everything you live through helps to make you the person you are now.
author: Sophia Loren

text: A moment lasts all of a second, but the memory lives on forever.
author: null

text: Memories are the key not to the past, but to the future.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

text: Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart.
author: Haruki Murakami

text: The past beats inside me like a second heart.
author: John Banville
